name: huggybear
description: On demand, persistent and unobstrusive dependencies

scripts.local-coverage: `npm bin`/coffee --js < spec/runner.coffee > spec/__compiled_runner.js && `npm bin`/istanbul cover spec/__compiled_runner.js -x "spec/**" 2> /dev/null && rm -f spec/__compiled_runner.js
scripts.coveralls: `npm bin`/coffee --js < spec/runner.coffee >spec/__compiled_runner.js && `npm bin`/istanbul cover spec/__compiled_runner.js -x "spec/**" --report lcovonly 2> /dev/null && rm -f spec/__compiled_runner.js && `npm bin`/coveralls < ./coverage/lcov.info

author: Xavier Cambar <xcambar@gmail.com>
